amendment.description: To preserve a national intercity passenger rail system by providing adequate funding of $1.45 billion for Amtrak in Fiscal Year 2007 and to fully offset this additional funding by closing corporate tax loopholes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3086 proposed by Senator Byrd.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3086 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 51.
